title: Plan to verify ages of children who use social media in Ireland to be considered by Cabinet
description: Instagram and Facebook have started shutting down social media accounts of children in Australia believed to be under 16
content:
A plan to verify the ages of children who use social media, as part of a wider plan to set a digital age of consent, will be considered shortly by Government.
